mapper.insert: insert into T_RECRUIT (RC_ID, RC_DEPARTMENT_ID, RC_POSITION_ID, RC_REQUIREMENT, RC_TREATMENT, RC_ADDRESS, RC_EDUCATION, RC_NAME, RC_STATUS) values (RC_ID_SEQ.nextval,#{department_id},#{position_id},#{requirement},#{treatment},#{address},#{education},#{name},#{status})
mapper.update: update T_RECRUIT set RC_DEPARTMENT_ID = #{department_id},RC_POSITION_ID=#{position_id},RC_REQUIREMENT=#{requirement},RC_TREATMENT=#{treatment},RC_ADDRESS=#{address},RC_EDUCATION=#{education},RC_NAME=#{name},RC_STATUS=#{status} where rc_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.*,rownum FROM T_RECRUIT t WHERE RC_STATUS=1) WHERE rownum>(${0}-1)*${1} and rownum<=${0}*${1}
